effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.

short_effect.black_white: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All status changes are returned to normal.
